alert.note: Alert for Grant; Morton; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 05 at 2:31PM CDT until October 06 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT /NOON MDT/ FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds up to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Grant, Morton, and Sioux Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 1 PM CDT /noon MDT/ Friday. For the Freeze Warning, from 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ this evening to 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Objects left unsecured outside will be blown around. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sub-freezing temperatures are also possible Friday night into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Use extra caution. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
